scripts.build: node_modules/jslint/bin/jslint.js --color 'src/**/*.js' '*.json' 'tests/**/*.js' && node_modules/jasmine-node/bin/jasmine-node --verbose tests/*.spec.js && node_modules/browserify/bin/cmd.js -e src/index.js --insert-global-vars global --standalone qrk --no-builtins| node_modules/uglify-js/bin/uglifyjs -o dist/qrk-sdk.min.js
